title: How to answer an essay on 'An Ideal Citizen' - Quora

response.answer_text: First begin with introduction, giving the meaning of citizen, relationship between citizen and the state etc.Next talk about how an ideal citizen is different from an average or a common citizen.Now divide the various things a citizen can do or should do to become an ideal citizenSocial: Ex helping others.Economic: Ex Paying taxes.Political: Ex Using Right to Vote.Next go for writing what an ideal citizen is not supposed to do’ Again you can put them under several sub-heads.You can give examples of a few ideal citizens you have in your mind or just search for them online and make a good paragraph. Don’t give more than three examples.Now, write a paragraph on how an ideal citizen can bring positive changes to the country and conclude by saying that every citizen must try to become an ideal citizen and contribute their best for the country.

Essay on “An Ideal Citizen” Complete Essay for Class 10, Class 12 and Graduation and other classes. Essay No. 01 A citizen is a person who lives in a state and is governed by its laws in all matters. An ideal citizen is an asset to a nation. Countries are not good or bad but their citizens make them so. Smugglers, law breakers and people of bad character are also citizens of a country but they cannot be called ideal citizens. An ideal citizen is every inch a patriot. Citizenship secures for the people a sense of security for their life and property. In a democratic country like India, a citizen enjoys the right of voting in elections to public bodies. He can himself stand as a candidate for election to the municipal committee of his town and legislative bodies of his country. He can even stand for the office of the president of the country.
